Package bio.singa.structure.parser.pdb.structures

Class StructureParserOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.structure.parser.pdb.structures.StructureParserOptions
  • public class StructureParserOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Options for faster or more detailed parsing.

      • isCreatingEdges

        public boolean isCreatingEdges()
        Setting this option true will connect the molecule with bonds. Turning the option false will result in faster parsing, if those information are not strictly required.

        Default value: true
        Returns:
        The value of this option.

      • createEdges

        public void createEdges​(boolean createEdges)
        Setting this option true will connect the molecule with bonds. Turning the option false will result in faster parsing, if those information are not strictly required.

        Default value: true
        Parameters:
        createEdges - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • isRetrievingLigandInformation

        public boolean isRetrievingLigandInformation()
        Setting this option to true will retrieve additional information from cif files from the PDB. This enables the detection modified amino acids and nucleotides als well as the retrieval of additional information for ligands and the connection of ligand atoms. Turning the option false will result in faster parsing, if those information are not strictly required.

        Default value: true
        Returns:
        The value of this option.

      • retrieveLigandInformation

        public void retrieveLigandInformation​(boolean retrieveLigandInformation)
        Setting this option to true will retrieve additional information from cif files from the PDB. This enables the detection modified amino acids and nucleotides als well as the retrieval of additional information for ligands and the connection of ligand atoms. Turning the option false will result in faster parsing, if those information are not strictly required.

        Default value: true
        Parameters:
        retrieveLigandInformation - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • isConnectingHydrogens

        public boolean isConnectingHydrogens()
        Setting this option to true will try to connect hydrogen atom tho their respective partners.

        Default value: false
        Returns:
        The value of this option.

      • connectHydrogens

        public void connectHydrogens​(boolean connectHydrogens)
        Setting this option to true will try to connect hydrogen atom tho their respective partners.

        Default value: false
        Parameters:
        connectHydrogens - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • isOmittingHydrogen

        public boolean isOmittingHydrogen()
        Setting this option to true will omit all hydrogen (and eventually deuterium) atoms in amino acids and nucleotides. Default value: false
        Returns:
        true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • omitHydrogens

        public void omitHydrogens​(boolean omitHydrogens)
        Setting this option to true will omit all hydrogen (and eventually deuterium) atoms in amino acids and nucleotides. Default value: false
        Parameters:
        omitHydrogens - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • isInferringTitleFromFileName

        public boolean isInferringTitleFromFileName()
        Setting this option to true will set the title of the structure to the file name. Default value: false
        Returns:
        true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • inferTitleFromFileName

        public void inferTitleFromFileName​(boolean inferTitleFromFileName)
        Setting this option to true will set the title of the structure to the file name. Default value: false
        Parameters:
        inferTitleFromFileName - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • isInferringIdentifierFromFileName

        public boolean isInferringIdentifierFromFileName()
        Setting this option to true will try parse any pdb identifier from the file name. Default value: false
        Returns:
        true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.

      • inferIdentifierFromFileName

        public void inferIdentifierFromFileName​(boolean inferIdentifierFromFileName)
        Setting this option to true will try parse any pdb identifier from the file name. Default value: false
        Parameters:
        inferIdentifierFromFileName - true to turn this option on, false to turn it off.
